title: New: HAPPY TRENDY – Sweaty Palms And Allergic To Cats
content:
I can relate to both these unwanted attributes, not that it makes much difference to the track, but it’s Happy Trendy’s relatability that makes his music such a wholesome experience.

Picking up where Casiotone For The Painfully Alone left off with his honest, slightly obsessive lyrical delivery, Sweaty Palms And Allergic To Cats is for all the lovers alone this Valentines. Check it out below, and grab it as a free download from our friends at Portals.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
